testsuite.name: Browsing Amazon Products

testcase.name: Browse What Other Users Are Looking At

testsuite.system-out:
Feature: Browsing Amazon Products In order to buy products As an Amazon customer I want to be able to browse products
--Output from Search For Products By Topic-- Scenario: Search For Products By Topic # features/Amazon.feature:6 Given I am on the Amazon homepage # AmazonSteps.groovy:16 When I search for "clean code" # AmazonSteps.groovy:20 Then I should see results with the name "clean code" # AmazonSteps.groovy:26
--Output from Browse What Other Users Are Looking At-- Scenario: Browse What Other Users Are Looking At # features/Amazon.feature:11 Given I am on the Amazon homepage # AmazonSteps.groovy:16 Then I should see products other users are looking at # AmazonSteps.groovy:31
testsuite.system-err: --Output from Search For Products By Topic-- --Output from Browse What Other Users Are Looking At--
